titleStmt.title: Lathams new and second booke of falconrie concerning the training vp of all hawkes that were vnmentioned in his first booke of the haggart faulcon and gerfaulcon, formerly printed; teaching approued medicines for all their diseases. / By Symon Latham, Gent.
Lathams falconry. Book 2
titleStmt.author: Latham, Simon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.B. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop neere Fleet-Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Printed by John Beale. Cf. STC.
The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron; the last leaf is blank.
Usually found bound with the 1615 variant of the first book (STC 15267.3).
Formerly identified as part 2 of STC 15268.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 804 and at reel 1835 (same copy filmed twice).
